title: What is the difference between products of Zn+dilute H2SO4 and Zn+concentrated H2SO4? - Quora

response.answer_text: Reaction of granulated zinc with dil.H2SO4 to yield hudrogen gas while reaction with conc.sulphuric acid evolves SO2 gas. Formation of zinc sulphate is common to both the reactions. Hope this answer helps you…
